promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a dynamic rare chameleon water-type pokemon with a regal tail. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regatide, a a dynamic rare chameleon water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Scissor Blow. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "chameleon", "water" or "Regatide". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, chameleon-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This elusive marine dweller, adept in transformation, thrives in aquatic realms. Its trademark Scissor Blow leaves rivals in a flux.
